## ToolboxCategory.isVisible() method

Whether the category is visible. A category is only visible if all of its ancestors are expanded and isHidden\_ is false.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isVisible(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

True if the category is visible, false otherwise.
